Our E-Waste Management App helps users dispose electronic waste in a safe and responsible way. The app makes it simple to identify, store, and submit e-waste by providing clear guidance and easy-to-use features.

It connects users with nearby authorized recycling centres, offers information on proper disposal methods, and encourages environmentally friendly habits.

Our goal is to support a cleaner environment by making e-waste disposal effortless for everyone.
